title: Register your farm waste exemptions online

details.description: Register agricultural and other farm waste you don't need an environmental permit for to store, recycle or dispose of in England and Wales with the Environment Agency
details.more_information:
There is no charge to register, but you must meet certain conditions.

Get detailed information on the Environment Agency website.

This service is only available in England and Wales. Find out about your agricultural waste responsibilities in Scotland and Northern Ireland.

To register, you’ll need:

  • your name and address
  • the registered address and number of your limited company, if you have one
  • the address where the exempt activity is being carried out
  • the reference numbers for the exemptions you’re registering - you can find exemption numbers on the Environment Agency website

If you can’t provide a postcode for the place where the exempt activity is taking place you will need a 12-digit grid reference.
details.introduction: Usually, you need a permit to treat, recover or get rid of farm waste. However, some low-risk activities are exempt if you’re registered. You can register with the Environment Agency’s online exemptions service.
